alert.note: Alert for Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 3:53AM MDT until July 18 at 5:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Todd County in south central South Dakota... Southwestern Tripp County in south central South Dakota... * Until 600 AM CDT. * At 453 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fairgrounds Housing, or 7 miles southwest of Mission, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mission around 500 AM CDT. Antelope around 505 AM CDT. Haystack Butte around 510 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hidden Timber, Keyapaha and Clearfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
